exercises.name: 4-7-8 Breathing
exercises.description: Calming technique for stress relief and better sleep
exercises.instructions: Inhale for 4 counts, hold for 7, exhale for 8. Repeat for 8 cycles.

exercises.name: Box Breathing
exercises.description: Military technique for focus and calm
exercises.instructions: Inhale, hold, exhale, and pause for equal counts of 4.

exercises.name: Energizing Breath
exercises.description: Quick technique to boost energy and alertness
exercises.instructions: Quick, rhythmic breathing to energize your body and mind.

exercises.name: Deep Relaxation
exercises.description: Extended breathing for deep meditation states
exercises.instructions: Slow, deep breathing for profound relaxation and meditation.
